0:
--------------------
Text: Steepletop, also known as the Edna St. Vincent Millay House, was the farmhouse home of Pulitzer Prize-winning poet Edna St. Vincent Millay and her husband Eugene Jan Boissevain, in Austerlitz, New York, United States.
Triplets:<Steepletop
1:
--------------------
Text: Steepletop:  Her former home and gardens are maintained by the Edna St. Vincent Millay Society.
Triplets:<Steepletop
2:
--------------------
Text: Steepletop:  It was declared a National Historic Landmark on November 11, 1971.
